xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DescriptionOfOperatingExpense: Policy holders' reserves, surrender expense and claims
xbrli:xbrl.in-bse-fin:DisclosureOfNotesOnSegmentsEx: (*) RBl's Master Direction on Financial Statements - Presentation and Disclosures, requires to divide the 'Retail banking' into (i) Digital Banking (as defined in RBI circular on Establishment of Digital Banking Units dated 7th April, 2022) and (ii) Other Retail Banking segment. (#) Including exceptional item
